attr.name: archive
attr.description: A space-separated list of URIs for archives of resources for the object.

attr.name: border
attr.description: The width of a border around the control, in pixels.

attr.name: classid
attr.description: The URI of the object's implementation. It can be used together with, or in place of, the data attribute.

attr.name: codebase
attr.description: The base path used to resolve relative URIs specified by classid, data, or archive. If not specified, the default is the base URI of the current document.

attr.name: codetype
attr.description: The content type of the data specified by classid.

attr.name: data
attr.description: The address of the resource as a valid URL. At least one of data and type must be defined.

attr.name: declare
attr.description: The presence of this Boolean attribute makes this element a declaration only. The object must be instantiated by a subsequent <object> element. In HTML5, repeat the <object> element completely each that that the resource is reused.

attr.name: form
attr.description: The form element, if any, that the object element is associated with (its form owner). The value of the attribute must be an ID of a <form> element in the same document.

attr.name: height
attr.description: The height of the displayed resource, in CSS pixels.  -- (Absolute values only.  NO percentages)

attr.name: name
attr.description: The name of valid browsing context (HTML5), or the name of the control (HTML 4).

attr.name: standby
attr.description: A message that the browser can show while loading the object's implementation and data.

attr.name: tabindex
attr.description: The position of the element in the tabbing navigation order for the current document.

attr.name: type
attr.description: The content type of the resource specified by data. At least one of data and type must be defined.

attr.name: typemustmatch
attr.description: This Boolean attribute indicates if the type attribute and the actual content type of the resource must match to be used.

attr.name: usemap
attr.description: A hash-name reference to a <map> element; that is a '#' followed by the value of a name of a map element.

attr.name: width
attr.description: The width of the display resource, in CSS pixels.  -- (Absolute values only.  NO percentages)

content: zero or more <param> elements, then transparent.
omission: None, both the starting and ending tag are mandatory.
parents: Any element that accepts embedded content.
